text: NGC 427 is a spiral galaxy of type (R)SB(r)a: located in the constellation Sculptor. It was discovered on September 25, 1834 by John Herschel. It was described by Dreyer as "3 very small (faint) stars with nebulosity (?)." ==References== ==External links== * 0427 18350925 Category:Sculptor (constellation) Category:Spiral galaxies
title: NGC 427
